body:
I need help on friending users. I suspect that only donors can friend. Is this true?
Thanks :)
body_tagged:
I need help on friending users. I suspect that only donors can friend. Is this true?
Thanks :)
title: Friending

replies.body: Everybody can friend people, but it has not yet been implemented into the new website :)
replies.body_tagged: Everybody can friend people, but it has not yet been implemented into the new website :)

reply_to.body: Everybody can friend people, but it has not yet been implemented into the new website :)
reply_to.body_tagged: Everybody can friend people, but it has not yet been implemented into the new website :)

replies.body: If you go to the old website, you are able to add friends.
replies.body_tagged: If you go to the old website, you are able to add friends.

replies.body: Ok thanks. Whats the old website IP Address?
replies.body_tagged: Ok thanks. Whats the old website IP Address?

replies.body:
old.avicus.net go the profile and friend whoever you want :P
Then they have to log on and accept
